headline: Real World Serverless: Serverless Use Cases and Best Practices
keywords: Serverless, Cloudflare Workers, JavaScript, Events, Video, Best Practices
description: Cloudflare Workers has had a very busy 2018. Throughout the year, Workers moved from beta to general availability, continued to expand its footprint as Cloudflare grew to 155 locations, and added new features and services to help developers create increasingly advanced applications.
